Material used.Description: Aggregation kinetics were measured using recombinant wild-type and E46K mutant alpha-synuclein proteins.

Readout description.Result Description: The E46K mutant exhibited significantly faster aggregation kinetics compared to wild-type alpha-synuclein, with a 2.5-fold increase in ThT fluorescence at 1 hour.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was measured in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein was used as a positive control for normal aggregation.

Basic negative control.Description: Buffer without protein was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-way ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: ThT fluorescence increase < 1.5-fold compared to wild-type at 1 hour.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: ThT fluorescence increase â‰¥ 2-fold compared to wild-type at 1 hour.

Material used.Material Name: HEK293 cells overexpressing wild-type or E46K mutant alpha-synuclein
Material used.Description: Protein expression levels were analyzed in HEK293 cells transiently transfected with wild-type or E46K mutant alpha-synuclein plasmids.

Readout description.Result Description: Western blot showed increased levels of insoluble alpha-synuclein aggregates in E46K-expressing cells compared to wild-type controls.

Technical replicates.Description: Each gel was run with three technical replicates.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Western blot bands for alpha-synuclein present in soluble fraction without insoluble aggregates.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Western blot bands for alpha-synuclein detected in insoluble fraction with reduced soluble protein levels.
